page.description: Converts an A5 color name to an HTML format color name. e.g. #FF0000

argument.name: include_hash
argument.description: If .t., the returned HTML color code will include a # (hash). Otherwise, the # is omitted.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns the HTML hexadecimal color code. If *[xb:include_hash]* is .t., the color code will be prefixed with a # (hash) symbol.
